structure.unit: STATE LIBRARIES -- LIBRARIANS -- STATE ARCHIVES AND RECORDS

law.catch_line: Designation of covered wooden bridges as shrines.
law.text: All covered wooden bridges within the state shall be designated as state shrines by the heritage division according to the procedures of the agency. Each covered wooden bridge shall be identified as such by an official marker placed by the Kentucky Historical Society.
law.history: Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 396, sec. 40, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 170, sec. 1. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 364, sec. 1.
